Spells:
Aid (S2 [Clockwork Soul] Abju): R30' 3 targets gain +5 temporary HP for 8 hr [+Level gives +5 temporary HP]
Alarm (S1 [Clockwork Soul] Abju): R30' Entry into a 20' cube by a non-designated creature triggers an audible or mental alarm for 8 hr [R]
Arms Of Hadar (S1 [Aberrant Mind] Conj): 10' radius inflicts 2d6 HP necrotic and no Reaction for 1 rd (Strength half HP only) [+Level inflicts +1d6 HP]
Blade Ward (S0 Abju): Self gains resistance to bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing weapon damage for 1 rd
Burning Hands (S1 Evoc): 15' cone inflicts 3d6 HP fire (Dexterity half) [+Level inflicts +1d6 HP]
Calm Emotions (S2 [Aberrant Mind] Ench): R60' 20' radius suppresses choice of charm and fright or hostility (Charisma neg) for conc up to 1 min
Chromatic Orb (S1 Evoc): R90' Ranged spell inflicts 3d8 HP choice of acid, cold, fire, lightning, poison, or thunder [+Level inflicts +1d8 HP]
Cone Of Cold (S5 Evoc): 60' cone inflicts 8d8 HP cold (Constitution half) [+Level inflicts +1d8 HP]
Confusion (S4 Ench): R90' Creatures in a 10' radius randomly 10% wander/50% do nothing/20% attack an adjacent creature/20% act normally (Wisdom neg) for conc up to 1 min [+Level increases radius by 5']
Creation (S5 Illu): R30' Creates a 5' cube of false matter lasting up to 1 dy [+Level creates +5' cube of matter]
Crown Of Madness (S2 Ench): R120' Self may order target's attacks each rd (Wisdom ends) for conc up to 1 min
Darkvision (S2 Tran): Willing touched sees 60' in darkness for 8 hr
Detect Thoughts (S2 [Aberrant Mind] Divi): R30' Self senses target surface thoughts and may probe deeper (Wisdom neg) for conc up to 1 min
Disintegrate (S6 Tran): R60' Target suffers 10d6+40 HP force and becomes dust if reduced to 0 HP (Dexterity neg); disintegrates large or smaller objects and magical forces [+Level inflicts +3d6 HP]
Dispel Magic (S3 [Clockwork Soul] Abju): R120' Ends the effects of a spell up to level 3; successful DC 10 + spell level ends a higher-level spell [+Level ends any spell of equal or lesser level]
Dissonant Whispers (S1 [Aberrant Mind] Ench): R60' Target suffers 3d6 HP psychic and uses Reaction to flee (Wisdom half HP only) [+Level inflicts +1d6 HP]
Dominate Beast (S4 Ench): R60' Target obeys self telepathic commands (Wisdom neg; damage yields another save) for conc up to 1 min [+Level extends duration to 10 min/1 hr/8 hr at level 5/6/7]
Dominate Person (S5 Ench): R60' Target obeys self telepathic commands (Wisdom neg; damage yields another save) for conc up to 1 min [+Level extends duration to 10 min/1 hr/8 hr at level 6/7/8]
Evard's Black Tentacles (S4 [Aberrant Mind] Conj): R90' 20' sq inflicts 3d6 HP bludgeoning and restrains (Dexterity neg, Strength or Dexterity breaks free) for conc up to 1 min
Fire Storm (S7 Evoc): R150' 10 connected 10' cubes inflict 7d10 HP fire (Dexterity half) and ignite unattended flammable objects
Freedom Of Movement (S4 [Clockwork Soul] Abju): Touched gains immunity to movement impediments for 1 hr
Friends (S0 Ench): Self gains on Adv on Charisma w/non-hostile target for conc up to 1 min; target becomes hostile afterward
Greater Invisibility (S4 Illu): Touched becomes invisible for conc up to 1 min
Greater Restoration (S5 [Clockwork Soul] Abju): Touched recovers from exhausted, charmed, petrified, or cursed or regains ability or HP maximum
Hunger Of Hadar (S3 [Aberrant Mind] Conj): R150' 20' radius inflicts 2d6 HP cold at creatures' start of turn and 2d6 HP acid at creatures' end of turn for conc up to 1 min
Incendiary Cloud (S8 Conj): R150' 20' radius inflicts 10d8 HP fire (Dexterity half) and moves away 10'/rd for conc up to 1 min
Lesser Restoration (S2 [Clockwork Soul] Abju): Touched recovers from blindness, deafness, disease, paralysis, or poison
Mage Armor (S1 Abju): Willing, unarmored touched gains AC 13 + Dexterity modifier for 8 hr (target donning armor ends)
Major Image (S3 Illu): R120' Creates a 20' cube sight, sound, and touch illusion (Investigation detects) for conc up to 10 min [+Level extends duration to permanent at level 6]
Message (S0 Tran): R120' Self and target may hold a whispered conversation for 1 rd
Mind Sliver (S0 [Aberrant Mind] Ench): R60' Target suffers 4d6 HP psychic and -1d4 next save (Intelligence neg) w/in 1 rd
Move Earth (S6 Tran): R120' Reshapes a 40' cube of earth each 10 minutes for conc up to 2 hr
Plane Shift (S7 Conj): Target (Charisma neg) or self and 8 willing others travel to another plane
Poison Spray (S0 Conj): R10' Target suffers 4d12 HP poison (Constitution neg)
Prestidigitation (S0 Tran): R10' Self may perform minor magic effects for 1 hr
Protection From Energy (S3 Abju): Touched gains resistance to choice of acid, cold, fire, lightning, or thunder damage for conc up to 1 hr
Protection From Energy (S3 [Clockwork Soul] Abju): Touched gains resistance to choice of acid, cold, fire, lightning, or thunder damage for conc up to 1 hr
Protection From Evil And Good (S1 [Clockwork Soul] Abju): Willing touched gains immunity to charm, fright, and possession from aberrations, celestials, elementals, fey, fiends, and undead; those creatures suffer Disadv on attacks on target
Rary's Telepathic Bond (S5 [Aberrant Mind] Divi): R30' 8 willing targets may communicate mentally for 1 hr [R]
Scorching Ray (S2 Evoc): R120' 3 ranged attacks inflict 2d6 HP fire each [+Level gives +1 ranged attack]
Sending (S3 [Aberrant Mind] Evoc): Self may exchange 25-word messages with a known target
Shield (S1 Abju): May cast as a Reaction to gain +5 AC and immunity to Magic Missile until next turn
Shocking Grasp (S0 Evoc): Touched suffers 4d8 HP lightning and cannot use Reaction until next turn
Sleet Storm (S3 Conj): R150' 40' radius douses flames and inflicts difficult terrain and falling prone (Dexterity neg)
Summon Aberration (S4 [Aberrant Mind] Conj): R90' Summoned beholderkin, slaad, or star spawn obeys self for conc up to 1 hr [+Level increases summoned's AC, HP, number of attacks, and damage]
Summon Construct (S4 [Clockwork Soul] Conj): R90' Summoned clay, metal, or stone construct spirit obeys self for conc up to 1 hr [+Level increases summoned's AC, HP, number of attacks, and damage]
Telekinesis (S5 [Aberrant Mind] Tran): R60' Self may mentally move a 1000 lb object 30'/rd (Strength neg) for conc up to 10 min
Time Stop (S9 Tran): Self gains 1d4+1 turns (affecting another creature or moving more than 1000' away ends)
Wall Of Force (S5 [Clockwork Soul] Evoc): R120' Creates 10 10'x10' impassable force panels for conc up to 10 min
Magic Notes:
Bastion Of Law: R30' Spend 1 - 5 Sorcery Points to absorb equal d8 HP damage to target until next use or long rest
Clockwork Cavalcade: 30' cu heals 100 HP total to targets, repairs damaged objects, and dismisses target spells up to 6th level 1/long rest (may spend 7 Sorcery Points for additional)
Elemental Adept (Cold): Cold spells ignore resistance and treat 1s as 2s on damage dice
Elemental Adept (Fire): Fire spells ignore resistance and treat 1s as 2s on damage dice
Elemental Adept (Thunder): Thunder spells ignore resistance and treat 1s as 2s on damage dice
Empowered Spell: May spend 1 Sorcery Point to reroll 3 spell damage dice
Font Of Magic: May use 20 Sorcery Points/long rest/May convert Sorcery Points to and from spell slots
Heightened Spell: May spend 3 Sorcery Points to inflict target Disadv on spell save
Psionic Sorcery: Cast spell using Sorcery Points instead of spell slot
Restore Balance: R60' Cancel target Adv or Disadv on roll 6/long rest
Seeking Spell: Spend 2 Sorcery Points to reroll missed spell attack
Sorcerous Restoration: Taking a short rest restores 4 Sorcery Points
Subtle Spell: May spend 1 Sorcery Point to cast a spell w/out somatic or verbal components
Transmuted Spell: Change spell damage from acid, cold, fire, lightning, poison, or thunder to another type
Warping Implosion: 120' teleport inflicts 3d10 HP in 30' radius of starting position and pulls 30' (Strength half, no pull) 1/long rest (may spend 5 Sorcery Points for additional)
Notes
Validation Errors: Selectable Feature Allocation: 5 available vs. 7 allocated
